text:
India Inc. has managed to mostly meet street expectations with its second-quarter performance so far, with 14 out of the 23 companies NSE Nifty 50 companies reporting earnings in-line with the forecast.Five companies, including two from the automobile sector, surpassed estimates while four underwhelmed, BloombergQuint analysis showed.






The Big PictureBeat Estimates: 5In Line: 14Miss Estimates: 4
















Close To The Halfway Mark
title: Q2 Nifty Earnings: The Scorecard So Far
